name: Carrot Cake
ingredients: 1/2 tsp salt 1 8-­‐oz can crushed pineapple, drained
2 tsp ground cinnamon 2 cups grated carrots
3 eggs, well beaten 1 3-­‐1/3-­‐oz can flaked coconut
3/4 cup vegetable oil 1 cup chopped walnuts
1/2 tsp soda 1 Tbs light corn syrup
1/2 cup butter, softened 2 cups sifted powdered sugar
1 8-­‐oz package cream cheese, softened 1 tsp grated orange rind
1 tsp vanilla extract 1 tsp orange juice
steps: Combine flour, soda, salt, and cinnamon; set aside.
Combine eggs, oil, buttermilk, sugar and vanilla; beat until smooth. Stir in four mixture, pineapple, carrots,
coconut, and chopped walnuts. Pour batter in to 2 greased and floured 9 inch round cake pans.
